pkgmetadata.longdescription: Inels-mqtt========A Python library that handles communication with inels over mqtt[iNels](https://www.inels.com/) by ElkoEP company.Requirements============For smooth using you need to have Python 3.9 or higher.Install=======Use PyPI repository```pip install inels-mqtt```Testing=======I use [tox](https://tox.readthedocs.io) for testing.```$ pip install tox```
